short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Battleship War is a HTML5 Skill Game. Hit all the ships of your enemy and lead your fleet to the victory!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Two games mode:
Classic: Guess the position of your enemy ships and destroy them!
Advanced: Collect points and buy 2 special power-up.

INTRODUCTION
Play Battleship War on your Google Chrome Browser with our simple & lightweight extension - No Internet required, no ADS, and 100% Free!

HOW TO INSTALL?
1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension
2. Pin the Battleship War extension icon to the Chrome toolbar
3. Click the Battleship War icon on the Chrome toolbar, the Battleship War popup will open. 
That's all you need to do! Have fun!

HOW TO PLAY?
Hit all the ships of your enemy and lead your fleet to the victory!
